snippet.title: Live Coding: Arduino Circuit Simulator & Designer (Part 1)
snippet.description:
Stream got cut off at the end and the rest is at https://youtube.com/video/mXZKNaDC-sM/
Today we'll build a few devices using an Arduino, but it will all be done using a simulator! We'll look at how to design a breadboard layout to share with others, but also test it all on the computer! It's great if you don't have all of the physical sensors or even an Arduino at all. We'll build a few simple examples using Fritzing and TinkerCAD and look at how it can be used. TinkerCAD can be used completely in the browser.

GitHub: https://www.github.com/DevDungeon
Support the stream: https://streamlabs.com/devdungeon
Join Discord: https://discord.gg/JWsSHJC
Get $100 credit for signing up to Digital Ocean: https://m.do.co/c/5ccd98162d85 
Buy my book: Security with Go https://www.packtpub.com/networking-and-servers/security-go
Website: https://www.devdungeon.com
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/DevDungeon
Download Streamlabs OBS and start streaming yourself for free: https://streamlabs.com/slobs/d/13836773
Opening music:  Song: Buzzsaw (feat. Zircon), Big Giant Circles & zircon, Imposter Nostalgia
